title: METTLE
description: Your courage, determination, and force of will in the face of danger

title: PHYSIQUE
description: Your physical strength, endurance, and bodily prowess

title: INFLUENCE
description: Your social standing, charisma, and ability to command others

title: EXPERTISE
description: Your knowledge, technical skills, and professional competence

title: CONVICTION
description: Your faith, spiritual strength, and resistance to corruption
